programme.desc: Renovation contractor KWAN KA-ON (Miu Kiu Wai) is the elder of four siblings, while his wife SZE LONG-KIU (Sonija Kwok) is a typical housewife. Buying a house is their longtime dream. But when his eldest brother, KWAN KA-HONG's business goes under, they shelve their plan to help him overcome his difficulties. KIU has to look for a job too. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage. programme.title: Wudang Rules
programme.desc: Having suffered a traumatic setback, former undercover police officer PAU KAI-CHUNG (Chin Siu Hou) takes shelter in the Wudang Mountains, where he encounters his senior and childhood acquaintance MO YEE-SHAN (Yuen Qiu). YEE-SHAN, who runs a hostel and teaches martial arts, lets KAI-CHUNG stay and work as a chef, above which she also takes in a blockhead of dubious background, HO CHING-TUNG (Derek Kok). Who could have thought a group of Hong Kong Kung Fu students would cause such a stir in this previously peaceful secluded getaway? The students include YEE-SHAN's daughter LOK YEUNG (Tavia Yeung), terminally ill boxing champion CHEUNG KA-KONG (Timmy Hung), wealthy heir LO YIK-HIN (Cheung Wing Hong), private bodyguard YEUNG CHING-WU (Toby Leung) and model SIU YUK (Regen Cheung) etc. It turns out that KAI-CHUNG and LOK YEUNG have already known each other in Hong Kong; whereas LOK YEUNG's sudden appearance triggers his grief-stricken memories. Later on, KAI-CHUNG unveils LOK YEUNG's real purpose which is to convince her mother to sell the hostel to a Hong Kong corporation. Pretending to be injured, YEE-SHAN appoints KAI-CHUNG to succeed her, continuing to teach everyone martial arts. On top of that, she even promises LOK YEUNG that she is going to fulfill her wish if LOK YEUNG is able to win the competition within three months. As the course is drawing to a close, CHING-TUNG suddenly becomes normal, and even recognizes who KAI-CHUNG really is. All of a sudden, the whole Wudang Mountains are on the verge of crisis......

programme.title: A Perfect Man
programme.desc: Yeung Yat-cheng (Joe Ma) has a good reputation in the realm of personal security. He is invited by his buddy Ha Chung-chau (Tsui Wing) to join a security company that is tasked with protecting a tycoon called Tseung Ding-tin (KK Cheung). While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. The couple's relationship is on the verge of breaking up.

However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

The three of them work in a huge tea garden of Sung's family. Wai meets Ngai Mui (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie) again, a girl from highlands. Ngau has always liked Mui and misunderstands that Wai has seized his lover away. The son-in-law of tea garden Fu Bill (Yuen Wah) and its housekeeper (Ching Hor Wai) admire Wai very much. Ngau is angry and jealous of Wai. He makes use of his marriage with Sung's eldest daughter Sheung Wah (So Yuk Wah, Louisa) to enter the Sung family. He sets Wai up and drives him out from the tea garden.

programme.title: Makmum Yang Paling Aku Cinta
programme.desc: Amru diminta untuk menampilkan saksi kukuh iaitu orang yang bersamanya pada malam itu. Namun Amru enggan bersetuju. Azmi hampir mati akal untuk mempertahankan Amru. Amru meminta agar Azmi menghubungi Megat Salehudin yang merupakan bekas polis untuk membantu Azmi menyiasat kes pembunuhan Kirana. Megat bersetuju untuk membantu Azmi namun mereka masih memerlukan saksi kukuh demi mempertahankan Amru. Amru berkira-kira untuk menampilkan Nailufar. Datin Amna kerana Amru sanggup membunuh Kirana. Datin Amna mulai bersolat dan malu pada dirinya sendiri. Amru terharu apabila melihat ayahnya bersemangat mempertahankannya dan menghulurkan bantuan sedaya upayanya. Amru akhirnya membuka mulut bahawa perempuan yang bersamanya pada malam itu adalah Nailufar, isterinya. Azmi terkejut!

Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called “mirror-touch synesthesia”. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. However, Hey-yan adheres to his beliefs as he is determined to uncover the truth and seek justice for the victims!

programme.title: Plain Love II
programme.desc: 'Fong's tea' is regarded as the finest in the trade. However, due to downfall of the family, its successor Yau Wai (Lam Ka Tung) can only earn his living by farming. WAI has two best friends, Hon Ngau (Mak Cheung Ching) and Wing Chun (Li Ka Sing, Dickson). They even become sworn brothers, share both happiness and bitterness. The three of them work in a huge tea garden of Sung's family. Wai meets Ngai Mui (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie) again, a girl from highlands. Ngau has always liked Mui and misunderstands that Wai has seized his lover away. The son-in-law of tea garden Fu Bill (Yuen Wah) and its housekeeper (Ching Hor Wai) admire Wai very much. Ngau is angry and jealous of Wai. He makes use of his marriage with Sung's eldest daughter Sheung Wah (So Yuk Wah, Louisa) to enter the Sung family. He sets Wai up and drives him out from the tea garden.

programme.title: A Perfect Man
programme.desc: Yeung Yat-cheng (Joe Ma) has a good reputation in the realm of personal security. He is invited by his buddy Ha Chung-chau (Tsui Wing) to join a security company that is tasked with protecting a tycoon called Tseung Ding-tin (KK Cheung). While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. Kali ini pengantara berada di Galaeri Perfileman yang ditubuhkan pada 2007 terletak di KL. Asalnya bangunan banglo tersebut adalah sebuah rumah keluarga. Galeri ini menyimpan peralatanperalatan lama perfileman untuk dipamerkan. Pengalaman misteri yang pernah dilalui oleh Encik Muhammad Rosli, penjaga galeri dikongsi bersama, beliau pernah beberapa kali terjumpa dengan lembaga wanita berambut panjang, pergerakan perkakasan dan bunyi yang menakutkan. programme.title: A Perfect Man
programme.desc: Yeung Yat-cheng (Joe Ma) has a good reputation in the realm of personal security. He is invited by his buddy Ha Chung-chau (Tsui Wing) to join a security company that is tasked with protecting a tycoon called Tseung Ding-tin (KK Cheung). While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. The couple's relationship is on the verge of breaking up.

Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

Azmi dan Mustafa menyampaikan berita kepada Nailufar dan mengejutkan apabila Nailufar bersedia untuk menampilkan dirinya sebagai saksi meskipun rahsianya terbongkar. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.
